channel.description: Recent content in Pre-Existing Population on RD's Blog

item.title: Multiple Diverse Ligands Binding at a Single Protein Site: A Matter of Pre-existing Populations
item.description: Notes on 2002 Protein Science review on how proteins with specificity bind multiple diverse ligands through pre-existing conformational populations and hinge-bending motions.
